fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- On night one, choose an Accomplice. They stay as their role, but now win with the Peasants. They gain your Sharpshot and Alert ability after revealing.
- During the day, you may reveal yourself as the Brigand. You can't be voted for anymore. Gain access to Sharpshot and Alert.
- Sharpshot x1: Deal an astral Powerful attack to any player one time, cleaning them.
- Alert x1: Gain Powerful defense and shoot any player who visits your house tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you die, your Accomplice returns to their original faction.
- If you fulfill your Destiny, you permanently gain Invincible defense.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Live for 2 nights after revealing yourself as the Brigand.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
